Sql.query: insert into tr_yyyymmdd_sp7( canalcodi, canalfhsist, canalvalor, canalcalidad, canalfechahora ) values( :canalcodi, :canalfhsist, :canalvalor, :canalcalidad, :canalfechahora )
update tr_yyyymmdd_sp7 set canalvalor = :canalvalor, canalcalidad = :canalcalidad, canalfechahora = :canalfechahora where canalcodi = :canalcodi and canalfhsist = :canalfhsist
delete from tr_yyyymmdd_sp7 where canalcodi = :canalcodi and canalfhsist = :canalfhsist
select canalcodi, canalfhsist, canalvalor, canalcalidad, canalfechahora from tr_yyyymmdd_sp7 where canalcodi = :canalcodi and canalfhsist = :canalfhsist
select canalcodi, canalfhsist, canalvalor, canalcalidad, canalfechahora from tr_yyyymmdd_sp7
select canalcodi, canalfhsist, canalvalor, canalcalidad, canalfechahora from tr_yyyymmdd_sp7

select * from ( select a.*, (row_number() over (order by a.canalcodi,a.canalfhsist)) as r from tr_{0}_sp7 a where ( a.canalcodi in ({1}) and (a.canalfhsist >= to_date('{2} 00:00:00','YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') and a.canalfhsist < to_date('{3} 00:00:00','YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS')+1) ) order by a.canalcodi,a.canalfhsist ) where (r >= ((({4}-1) * {5}) + 1) and r < (({4} * {5}) + 1 )) or ({4} = -1 and {5} = -1)

select * from ( select a.*,(SELECT TCS7.CALNOMB FROM TR_CALIDADICCP_SP7 TCS7 WHERE TCS7.CALCODI = a.canalcalidad fetch first 1 row only) AS CALIDADDESCRIPCION, (row_number() over (order by a.canalcodi,a.canalfhsist)) as r from tr_{0}_sp7 a where ( a.canalcodi in ({1}) and (a.canalfhsist >= to_date('{2}','YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') and a.canalfhsist < to_date('{3}','YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS')) ) order by a.canalcodi,a.canalfhsist ) where (r >= ((({4}-1) * {5}) + 1) and r < (({4} * {5}) + 1 )) or ({4} = -1 and {5} = -1)

select * from ( select a.*,(select canalnomb from tr_canal_sp7 z where z.canalcodi=a.canalcodi) canalnomb, (select calnomb from tr_calidadiccp_sp7 z where z.calcodi=a.canalcalidad) calnomb, (row_number() over (order by a.canalcodi,a.canalfhsist)) as r from tr_{0}_sp7 a where ( a.canalcodi in ({1}) and (a.canalfhsist >= to_date('{2} 00:00:00','YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') and a.canalfhsist < to_date('{3} 00:00:00','YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS')+1) and ((((mod(to_number(to_char(canalfechahora, 'MI')),5) != 0 or mod(to_number(to_char(canalfechahora, 'SS')),0) != 0 or mod(to_number(to_char(canalfechahora, 'ff3')),0) != 0) and Canalcalidad!={7} and Canalcalidad!={8} )and {6}=1) or {6}=0) ) order by a.canalcodi,a.canalfhsist ) where (r >= ((({4}-1) * {5}) + 1) and r < (({4} * {5}) + 1 )) or ({4} = -1 and {5} = -1)

select count(*) from tr_{0}_sp7 a where ( a.canalcodi in ({1}) and (a.canalfhsist >= to_date('{2} 00:00:00','YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') and a.canalfhsist < to_date('{3} 00:00:00','YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS')+1) and ((((mod(to_number(to_char(canalfechahora, 'MI')),5) != 0 or mod(to_number(to_char(canalfechahora, 'SS')),0) != 0 or mod(to_number(to_char(canalfechahora, 'ff3')),0) != 0) and Canalcalidad!={5} and Canalcalidad!={6} )and {4}=1) or {4}=0) )
CREATE TABLE tr_{0}_sp7 ( CANALCODI NUMBER(10) NOT NULL , CANALFHSIST TIMESTAMP(3) NOT NULL , CANALVALOR NUMBER(10,4) NULL , CANALCALIDAD NUMBER(3) NULL , CANALFECHAHORA TIMESTAMP(3) NULL )
COMMENT ON TABLE tr_{0}_sp7 IS 'Tabla de datos hist√≥ricos Siemens del dia {0}.'
COMMENT ON COLUMN tr_{0}_sp7.CANALCODI IS 'Codigo de canal'
COMMENT ON COLUMN tr_{0}_sp7.CANALVALOR IS 'Valor de canal'
COMMENT ON COLUMN tr_{0}_sp7.CANALCALIDAD IS 'Calidad de canal'
COMMENT ON COLUMN tr_{0}_sp7.CANALFECHAHORA IS 'Estampa de tiempo de la empresa (al milisegundo)'
COMMENT ON COLUMN tr_{0}_sp7.CANALFHSIST IS 'Estampa de tiempo del sistema (al milisegundo)'
CREATE UNIQUE INDEX PK_tr_{0}_sp7 ON tr_{0}_sp7 (CANALCODI, CANALFHSIST)

select * from tr_{0}_sp7 where ((canalcalidad between 0 and 15) or (canalcalidad between 64 and 79) or (canalcalidad between 128 and 143) or (canalcalidad between 192 and 207)) and (to_char(canalfechahora, 'MI:SS') in ( '00:00', '30:00')) and canalcodi in ({1})

WITH TCIRCRANK AS ( SELECT CANALCODI, CANALFHSIST, CANALVALOR, CANALFECHAHORA, CANALCALIDAD, RANK() OVER (PARTITION BY CANALCODI ORDER BY CANALFHSIST DESC) AS RNUM_P FROM TR_{0}_SP7 WHERE CAST(CANALFHSIST AS DATE) BETWEEN (TO_DATE('{1}', 'YYYY/MM/DD HH24:MI:SS') - interval '15' minute) and TO_DATE('{1}', 'YYYY/MM/DD HH24:MI:SS') GROUP BY CANALCODI, CANALFHSIST, CANALVALOR, CANALFECHAHORA, CANALCALIDAD ) SELECT CANALCODI, CANALFHSIST, CANALVALOR, CANALFECHAHORA, CANALCALIDAD FROM TCIRCRANK WHERE RNUM_P = 1 ORDER BY CANALCODI desc

SELECT CANALCODI FROM TR_CANAL_SP7 A WHERE A.EMPRCODI > 0 and A.emprcodi <> 324 and EMPRCODI IS NOT NULL and CANALCODI > 0 AND CANALPOINTTYPE IS NOT NULL AND A.CANALCODI IN (SELECT FG.CANALCODI FROM TR_MUESTRARIS_SP7 FG WHERE FG.CANALFHORA <= TO_DATE('2025/04/04 00:00:00', 'YYYY/MM/DD HH24:MI:SS')) order by canalnomb asc
SELECT * FROM TR_{0}_SP7 WHERE CANALCODI = {1} AND CAST(CANALFHSIST AS DATE) BETWEEN TO_DATE('{2}', 'YYYY/MM/DD HH24:MI:SS') AND TO_DATE('{3}', 'YYYY/MM/DD HH24:MI:SS') ORDER BY CANALFHSIST DESC
select * from tr_canal_sp7 where canalcodi = :canalcodi
DELETE FROM TR_MUESTRARIS_SP7 WHERE CANALCODI = {0}

INSERT INTO TR_MUESTRARIS_SP7 (CANALCODI, CANALFECHA, CANALCALIDAD, CANALFHORA, CANALFHORA2, CANALNOMB, CANALICCP, EMPRCODI, CANALVALOR, ESTADO, MUERISUSUCREACION, MUERISFECCREACION, MUERISUSUMODIFICACION, MUERISFECMODIFICACION) VALUES({0}, SYSDATE, '{1}', TO_TIMESTAMP('{2}', 'YYYY/MM/DD HH24:MI:SS.FF3'), TO_TIMESTAMP('{3}', 'YYYY/MM/DD HH24:MI:SS.FF3'), '{4}', '{5}', {6}, {7}, '{8}', '{9}', SYSDATE, '{10}', SYSDATE)
SELECT CALCODI, CALNOMB FROM TR_CALIDADICCP_SP7 ORDER BY CALNOMB ASC
